name: DeQuest
intro: Reputation layer for the entire Metaverse
introduce: DeQuest is a Learn-to-Play-to-Earn (L2P2E) certified platform, with the goal of building a reputation layer for the entire Metaverse. It is the first platform of its kind for Metaverse users who want to understand game economics, gameplay mechanics, tokenomics, and read in-depth research analyses of Play-to-Earn games. It serves as a bridge to easily track players’ knowledge and skill levels across Metaverse ecosystems, as well as their ability to carry out jobs in the Web3 world.
